text: The Boston Police Department is the main law enforcement agency in Boston, Massachusetts. There are currently 2,144 sworn uniform police personnel and 569 civilian members. They also have 33 K-9s. ==References== == Other websites == * * * * * * * Category:Boston Category:Law enforcement agencies of the United States Category:1838 establishments in the United States Category:19th- century establishments in Massachusetts
title: Boston Police Department
